name: Out of Phase Synchroncity
description:
A friendly and mysterious stranger guides you on a night out in Kawami. It's your first time in the big city. Make it count. 

"Out of Phase Synchronicity " was my IntroComp 2020 submission and it's earned an Honorable Mention. 

This version is published as-is and is here for archival purposes. This isn't the last you'll get of Max and Tanya....

Thanks to the organizers for the event, and for the feedback I've received by everyone who has played and rated it!

Banner credits: "IMG_7655" by jamestee is licensed under CC BY-NC-SA 2.0
